## Colors.normalizeColorTokensForTest() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

This utility function can be used to normalize color codes into human-readable tokens. This is useful for producing more readable test snapshots.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static normalizeColorTokensForTest(text: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
